content.detailedDescription: Around 6pm january 11, 2012 i witnessed something unknown in the sky. i was leaving my apartment to get gasoline for my car. as i was walking out of the building i glanced left towards the sky and saw something insane. in the sky there were 2 huge cigar shaped objects. they were like huge skinny rectangle objects. both had what looked like 5 flashing orange lights coming from square windows or something or the sorts. the one cigar shaped ufo was slowly turned round and round counter clockwise. the cigar shaped ufo to the right of the first one seemed to move towards the rotating ufo and then it crossed a path in front of it. now what appeared to be a black helicopter was hurrying around both of the ufos. i have no idea what it was doing? inspecting? the whole event of my witnessing this took place under 30 seconds because i ran back to the apartment to have my mother and son come out and look at the phenomenon. i was scared to death! as soon as we all came outside to look everything was gone. last week i witnessed a star light object hovering in the sky in peoria, il. is there something going on in the illinois? anyone else from illinois witness anything bizarre in the sky?
content.summary: 2 cigar shaped ufo with apparent black helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 7:50pm on 01/10/12 from my backyard in the mt. baker neighborhood of seattle, i witnessed three lights in the shape of a triangle flying in a straight path from east to west. i live right in the path of sea-tac airport, so i am well familiar with planes of all types flying overhead, at all altitudes. this was definitely not a plane. 

i was unable to determine whether it was one triangular shaped object with lights on all 3 points, or 3 smaller objects flying in that formation. i will say, however, that right as it was leaving my field of vision it appeared one of them was separating from the other two. there was no noise whatsoever.

the object(s) was moving far faster than any balloon or chinese lantern could, but nowhere near as fast as a meteor or shooting star. it took about 1-2 minutes to travel from directly overhead to the horizon (i lost sight of it when it went past beacon hill).

late in 2011 (i dont remember the exact date) i witnessed a smilar event, except it was moving from north to south. i am hoping others witnessed this event and let me know, first of all so i know im not crazy, and secondly because it definitely seems to me like something is going on here in seattle. i was quite jittery after seeing this, and truly wish i had been able to take a video of the event.
content.summary: 3 lights in triangular shape moved from east to west making no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I am going to redo this i was freaking out the last time..Let me try this agine...Now that im not having a panic attack which i have about everytime i try to talk about it..People have never taken my story serious.
when i was a child i had problems sleeping so i use to go out in the woods and walk with a flashlight..

well one morning around 2 am i went for a walk and heard a strange hum that was not coming from any farm machine i knew off so i followed the noise..
in a baseball field above where i live there was a cigar shaped ship with 2 id say 7 foot tall men with blonde hair that was braided down there backs in suites that looked like a jumpsuite after ud glue silver glitter all over it...
they where what seems like working on a small square part of the ship that was opened up like u open a car door kinda...

for about a hour i watched them many lights where bliniking all diffrent colors it seemed from what ever they where doing.But only the part of the craft they where working on so id say it was coming from inside the craft inner workings and the device they where useing looked kinda like a gluegun id say with a strange steady light coming from it.(id say working on there craft)..

about a hour later they close this spot in there ship and a walk way opened in what id say was the back of the craft and they got in it they seems to move in a more calm flow then me or you it wasent sloppy they moved in a flow with eachother step per step...

shortly after the hum got louder and rocks and garbage just about anything that was around me on the ground since i was trying to hide in the bush outta fear picked up off the ground like it was vibrating or something and the hum built up into a bbboooom and it zipped off into the clouds and knocked me on my butt i mean it lifted me off my feet like some kinda sonic bbooomm and i smacked my back first off a tree and they where gone..
for the next id say week after there where helicopters going over the area at lower then id think was normal i was only a child but looking back on it doesnt seem normal.

im sorry about the report before this:i was very excited to make a report about it and got ahead of my self and made a very bad account of what had happend i still get panic attacks from it and nightmares... if anybody knows anything about this or had a encounter like mine please tell me..This has been eating away at me my hole life case it just isent in the fram of reality i thought i knew...
content.summary: I seen them workin on there ship

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work about 1:30 indiana time, when about 15 degrees to my right, above the trees triangle formation of red lights came on, in an instant zipped to a position directly in front of me, as i drove closer they suddenly zipped down at an angle directly at me stopped hovered for a moment zipped back to prior position in front of me hovered for a moment, then slowly moved south east somewhat in the direction of greater cincinnati airport (cvg) it was very odd that something could zip that fast stop and zip again without change of speed being noticed no jerkiness no swaying swerving almost as if but not a light turn on in one spot then turn on in another it was that fast, but didnt go out. in sept 2011 while my wife and i were visiting our son who is usaf aircraft mechanic, our other sons one also usaf aircraft mechanic and other son witnessed several red lights in approximately same place, but hovering over woods by our home, but started out with 2 or 3 lights then other lights joined and lined up hovered over the woods for a while then left area, i told them to call 911 non emergency so that it could be documented, she said there have been many sighting in the area, but she saidwell just call it a shooting star my usaf son told her he was in usaf and knows its not a an airplane or shooting star, she said maybe it was the satellite that was to fall, but didnt fall at that time. so she said again well just call it a shooting star. my parents seen the triangle also above their property a couple years earlier. but it had a whitish blue light in middle. and dad said he could see surface of it and it looked like riveted panels?????????It seems odd that the thing would frequent the area. any help would be greatly appreciated. and will definitely help any way i can.
content.summary: Lites appeared, zipped left,descended, at angle toward me, rose back up and slowly left area

content.detailedDescription: It was a summer night not sure of the month it was dusk for some reason that night seemed like a lot of people were standing outside in there driveways which we were doing also i was at a friends house at the time anyway we all here this sound which is going to b e hard to explain it was like a pulling in sound like an energy static sound then made a sound like a rocket fireing its engine but it only lasted like 2 seconds then it flew right over us it was pure white looked like glowing electricity it was a triangle shape but squared its hard. to explain the shape but anyway it kept flying straight and gaining speed from the time it went over us and you can clearly see it was in space already was maybe 20 seconds or less and even after it left earth you can still see it looked like a star but it didn't go down the horizon like rockets do when they launch from cocoa beach they go out to the east and go down as the earth turns anyway this didn't it stayd in the same spot but getting farther away then about 15 mins after we have been watching it two helicopters were flying around in the distance but we were all like there way to late now unless they can fly out into space but that's about it for that one i have a lot more i have seen back in the late 90s one was flying maybe 75 to a 100 feet away from me along side of me on the highway then one night we stoped on the side of the raod and watched 3 huge building like crafts come down they were around 1 to 2 miles long and a half mile thick well if you have any questions you can email me or call me on the cell # i gave you.
content.summary: A number of people saw it it came out of a lake and came right over us and went straight into space

content.detailedDescription: It was a summer night not sure of the month it was dusk for some reason that night seemed like a lot of people were standing outside in there driveways which we were doing also i was at a friends house at the time anyway we all here this sound which is going to b e hard to explain it was like a pulling in sound like an energy static sound then made a sound like a rocket fireing its engine but it only lasted like 2 seconds then it flew right over us it was pure white looked like glowing electricity it was a triangle shape but squared its hard. to explain the shape but anyway it kept flying straight and gaining speed from the time it went over us and you can clearly see it was in space already was maybe 20 seconds or less and even after it left earth you can still see it looked like a star but it didn't go down the horizon like rockets do when they launch from cocoa beach they go out to the east and go down as the earth turns anyway this didn't it stayd in the same spot but getting farther away then about 15 mins after we have been watching it two helicopters were flying around in the distance but we were all like there way to late now unless they can fly out into space but that's about it for that one i have a lot more i have seen back in the late 90s one was flying maybe 75 to a 100 feet away from me along side of me on the highway then one night we stoped on the side of the raod and watched 3 huge building like crafts come down they were around 1 to 2 miles long and a half mile thick well if you have any questions you can email me or call me on the cell # i gave you.
content.summary: A number of people saw it it came out of a lake and came right over us and went straight into space

content.detailedDescription: We were driving past the high school in cortez and turned north.  i caught a glimpse of light to the east and saw quite a few flashing lights in a random pattern.  it only lasted a few seconds, long enough to ask my son if he saw it too.  as soon as he acknowledged he had, they disappeared.  it was like they were never there, it was a clear night with no cloud cover.  we were in awe, and were confused by what we saw.  but excited at the same time.
content.summary: Several blinking lights in a random pattern

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd today: 

i was waking up this morning and felt something moving through my entire body like electricity, and heard music and voices and boards clanging.  i could not make out what the voices were saying but it sounded like a man and woman talking.  i had the sensation that there was someone in the house that shouldnt be there. after i woke up i looked around and found no one there, but my son who is 26 years old and mentally retarded, was very upset.  he said that there were alien beings in the house and he watched them stick needles into our navels and eyes.  his voice sounds different, as if it is another persons voice rather than his own.  he has never said anything like that before or been upset like this so i believe him.  he has new marks on his foot today that werent there before, and in an earlier incident got a square burn mark on his back.  i have had strange things happen my entire life, and recently thought that people were breaking into our house due to the strange voices, so moved in with my niece.  she said that she heard the music and voices of people in the house today as well, and searched the property, but no one was inside or outside, and the doors were all locked.  we have been hearing these strange things for several years starting at my house in mississippi, then my apartment here, but this is the first time that my son has said anything about seeing aliens. now he wants to leave and get away from here but we have nowhere else to go. i did not know anything about mufon before today, but found the contacts for missouri today and called.
content.summary: Three entities in my house and possible abduction

content.detailedDescription: My name is dan. i have never seen or claimed to see a ufo in my life. on new years eve 2012, i took my dog out to go to the bathroom around 11:10 pm. i noticed a red light in the sky to the south. at first it had a bit of an aura around it which made me think it was a chinese lantern. as it got closer the aura disappeared and it made me think maybe it was a meteor or something. but the object continued to move northwest at a steady pace. it moved a little slower than a low flying plane, it took around a minute and a half to travel from horizon to horizon. whatever it was flew pretty much right over my head, and made no sound at all. all the geese on the nearby lake were going crazy like i'd never heard them before. although that may have been from fireworks that were being set off. well that's about all i can say. it really got my heart racing, never seen anything like it in my life.
content.summary: Around 11:10 pm on new years eve 2012 i saw a glowing red/orange orb fly over my head a little slower than a low flying plane.

content.detailedDescription: Whilst on a family holiday, in the scottish highlands,i went outside to observe the sky.Being higher and less poluted it offered better viewing than what i was used to.There was also the chance to see meteorites at that time of year.The sky was brilliant as there was practically no clouds.Just after i had started searching i noticed movement coming from a south-easterly direction, which i initially thought was a shooting-star,but it kept moving in a,merged and moved on slower,steady path.As it approached a star it stopped and seemed to merge with the star for about 5 seconds,it continued to move again,changing its course towards another star where it repeated the same thing.I called on my 3 sons to i asked them to come out and see what i was looking at.I asked them what they thought it was,to which my eldest replied a satelite.I explained, in my limited knowledge,that satelites flew in a fixed orbit normally.The object moved in this zig-zag manner for another 5 minutes then disappeared behind one of the few clouds in the sky that night and never saw it again.I,ve always been open-minded about u.F.O.S but i,m leaning towards believing in them.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright star-like object

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were outside at about 10pm on new years eve just looking at the stars in what happened to be a completely clear sky that night.  my husband was the first to notice it, and he quickly pointed out a red-orange orb hovering above the trees probably at least a mile from where we live.  the object hovered in the same area for a few moments and than began to quickly flash from one bright color to another.  i dont remember the exact sequence of the colors, but i do remember that it was quite bizarre and unlike anything i had ever seen.  it was not the typical blinking of lights commonly displayed by aircraft.  we were only able to watch the object for a few moments before it disappeared behind the trees and we lost sight of it.

 this sighting was entirely different than a ufo we had observed a few years prior in the vancouver, wa area where there were three red lights in a triangular formation hovering directly above our vehicle.  it was about 9:30pm, and we were driving on a country road with no other vehicles around at the time of this sighting. we literally stopped directly under the object which was no more than 100-200 yards above us.  as soon as we stopped the ufo ascended more quickly than i have ever seen anything move in my life.  the object was completey silent the entire time.
content.summary: Red-orange orb hovered in the clear sky for a minute than began flashing different colors.

content.detailedDescription: Was on the hill uritorco, was taking photographs of the landscape and never saw the object, when i saw the pictures note that one of them was this object is clearly seen without any distortion, was very excited, i always liked this theme , cry of emotion, still i have the picture.
content.summary: Round with flames behind

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work and decided to take cherry creek dam rd instead of i-225 into aurora, co.  i was merging onto parker road approaching the hampden exist and noticed in the sky before my turn this object in the sky over cherry creek resevoir.  i couldn't take a picture because i was driving and there wasn't any place to really pull over.  i noticed that it looked like a plane that was vertical with no wings and had 3 lights on it.  i recently watched the movie "the fourth kind" and this experience has completely feaked me out!
content.summary: It looked like a cigar or plane with no wings.  it was metal light,metal light metal light.

content.detailedDescription: When i was 14 i had a encounter..I seen two 7 foot tall blond humans with silver glitter like suites on outside of a ship i think fixing it in a baseball field in the woods where i grew up they worked on this ship for about a hour got in it and ziped away..Iv never told anybody but im ready to talk about it case i wanna know what i saw..I dont wanna feel crazy anymore and nobody bealives me..Not one person has ever bealived me..And i just want somebody to take it serious case it bothers me that i think i seen aliens..Im not good at spelling so im not gonna put to much on here i just wanna talk to somebody and tell them what happened and maybe find people who can try to explane what i saw so i can be at easy at long last about it and not feel crazy
content.summary: I think i seen them woring on there ship

content.detailedDescription:
1977

afternoon sometime.

while traveling west on hwy 60 just west of yeehaw junction with my 
family (mom and 2 brothers) when we noticed the ground was on fire.
the fire was stretched from the south side to the north side of 
the road.

the fire ended next to a shinny dark disc shaped oject (dome top) 
that was laying at a slight angle on the ground. it looked like it 
had crashed landed or made an abrupt landing. there was no landing 
gear seen. as far as we could tell the ufo must have let off some 
kind of energy that sparked the dry ground on fire as the ufo was 
going down.

approx. size of the object 50 ft diameter and 10 ft tall. 
approx 100 ft away.

it was an medium cloudy day, dry.

we stood there for a minute or so looking at it - when we got really
scared and decided we all should leave.

i was just about 10 yrs old so my date and exact details like 
size/distance may not be accurate. but the incident is factual.
content.summary: 1977 crash landed ufo west of yeehaw junction

content.detailedDescription:
Right after a christmas party at school some of us were leaving, just a few friends and me stayed longer. we sat down to the ground. they started to talk, while i've focused on this beautiful night sky. i remember this night as it was yesterday. i've always watched the sky and i am into astrophysics since i'm alive. i know the nightsky and am easily able to tell what lights are stars, which ones are satellites, aircrafts, etc. 

i saw a bright light. first i thought it was a satellite, but it was even brighter than those i've seen before. it hasn't moved at all and there wasn't any sound. i kept focusing on that light. i just wanted to know where it came from and what it was. suddenly it started to get brighter, maybe thicker. i started to feel strange. i coulnd't think anything. there was something like a compression in my ears. it didn't hurt and i didn't feel uncomfortable at all. i tried to turn over to my friends, but i couldn't. it felt like anything wanted me to watch. maybe it was myself, somehow. so i kept looking. 

this bright object suddenly splitted into 3 smaller starlike ones. they were obviously taking positions. after a few seconds it seemed like they'd reached the final form. it was a triangle. i can not tell, if it was one big objects or 3 small ones. i prefer saying it were multiple objects. they abruptly flew away with such high speed, that i'm totally sure, that this thing, whatever it was, wasn't human technology.

after this encounter, i sat up and took a look at my friends. they were sitting about 3 meters far away on a bench. i asked them if they saw the sky and a big bright 'star'. they negated and told me they were inside for about 2 minutes and have told me that before. i can't remember, i couldn't here them.

it was one of my strangest encounters and though it's been a few years since that night, i remember everything very clearly. i have never told anyone before. i hope that someday i might get an answer for all these things i've seen.
content.summary: One big bright obejct splitting into 3 smaller starlike ones

content.detailedDescription: This picture was discovered 2 days after taken. i noticed that the tree branch is in front of the image, perhaps ruling out lens flare or other lens related phenomenon.
content.summary: Image found 2 days later when reviewing the pictures on my computer.

content.detailedDescription: i was driving through town (three blocks from my house) when i noticed some lights that seemed to be very low.  my first thought was an airplane but then i saw that it was a triangle shaped object. i was on a side street, so i stopped the car to take a better look.  i could see a distinct triangle shape, with three light on the bottom of the object.  the lights were white, red, and green, and the object itself was a dark black.  even though it was night i could still see the outline and the fact that it was a solid object.  it was flying from north to south, and moving kind of slowly. i was excited about seeing it and i do remember just being in awe over how it looked. i did look at the time on my cell phone and it was exactly 6:30 pm. i watched it until 6:32 until i lost sight of it. i came straight home afterwards and a friend sent me a text saying that she had just heard on her scanner that a military helicopter was in trouble and making an emergency landing at our airport. (about 4 miles from my house) the scanner reported that the military helicopter had 3 people aboard, and was having engine trouble. (it landed safely) the helicopter flew directly over my house in route to the airport, and i thought it was odd that this happened right after i had spotted the triangle object.
content.summary: While driving through town i noticed very low lights so i slowed down to look, and then saw it was a triangle shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work.  i went out on the west loading dock.  i noticed a jet with a long vapor trail aound 9:50am.  right beside it was this white (i would say a craft of sorts).  i watched it for about 10 min off and on.  it looked like a star at night (like saturn but not has bright or big.  it did not glimer like a jet window would in the sun light.  when i first saw it, i thought it was a jet.  i believe it was higher than the jets that i saw.  the sky was a clear day bright blue.  i do not beleive it was a ballon, we at times launch them for fun.  this object did not wave like a ballon does.  looked like about half the size of one of the jets.
 i used 7' fence post to see if it was moving it was not.  i called someone over i work with, when i pointed to it he also saw it.  then i got someone in the store, he also saw it too.  i left my job for a short break in my truck.  when i got back 15 min later it was gone.
i believe i saw a craft that was not man made. i was very excited to see something you do not see everyday

photo note:  i took a photo with a cell phone 2 mp really does not look very good or even there
content.summary: White star seen hovering west of cheyenne, wy - with two jets passing by at 10 am

content.detailedDescription:
Clear blue sky, nye morning; glowing object appeared, straight path, leisurely, over silicon valley, ca.  wached for about 5-7 minutes, to high to video, but plenty of pics.
called nephew out to side yard to see.  he did not believe, until he saw it; we watched together, while i used my rebel ti3 12.2 mp,with 300mm zoon lense (did not have tripod)  took plenty of pics; went inside to put on computer; had to zoon in 300% to get good look.  seemed to be changing shape during path, like another i took at same place, approximate time of day, three years prior (report on mufon).
made some photoshop moves to bring out contrast.
content.summary: Clear blue sky, nye morning; glowing object appeared, straight path, leisurely, over silicon valley, ca.  wached for about 5-7 minutes, to high to video, but plenty of pics.

content.detailedDescription: I went to bring my dog out, walked into the front yard and looked up at the stars it was a very clear night there were stars everywhere i just looked around and looked towards my neighbors house and noticed this bright orange orb that was quite large almost the size of a quarter. it was heading my way which was north, going a little fast a few seconds later it went really fast and turned around and headed south, it went faster then, and became almost completely invisible 3 times i watched it as it kept going for a few minutes and then it disappeared. there was no noise at all either. when i first seen it i knew it was a u.F.O. and i was excited because i've always wanted to see one and i finally got to.
content.summary: Orange, and round, almost the size of a quarter headed north and then picked up speed and turned right around and headed south, became invisible 3 times and went really fast and was out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday morning i went outside to watch the clear sky and around 12:21p.M. i noticed 1 orb to the north i got my phone out and looked into the sky and it was gone then i seen two appear and then another 3 appear they were at first rotating in a circle.(imagine a start that has 5 points and the star was spinning and all you would see were its points.) then the orbs spread out into a cross shape and started moving.I was able to take my phone out and press record. sadly for some strange reason it was almost dead and i was able to record 9 secs before my battery darned and my phone turned it's camera recorder mode off. good this is that you can see these orbs in the video but there quick appearing and disappearing. my camera phone has a 5megapixle camera so its quality is good,but you need to stop video to see clear details. i don't have a cord to upload into my computer so please contact me and ill send the video over my phone for you to see. 
back to the story,after my phone died i watched for 2 more minutes as three disappeared and last two rotated around one another.  
i have reported one other thing on this website and the mufon investigator is kinda in contact(i have new phone so i can be called now, old one was broken and just got new one last week)
but we haven't talked yet because my phone was broken. so i had to get a new one.
i can send the video i got over a text massage
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 orbs spread into a crossshape then 3 vanished and other two orbs rotated around eachother

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving west between concho, az and st. johns, az. about halfway between, we stopped so my friend could pee. while stopped, we noticed  2 lights to the south moving parallel to the road, seeming to move together as if they were connected by a bar that appeared to be diagonal to the horizon. one light at each end. no blinking lights or anything that resembled an airplane. there was no sound. it seemed to be moving slowly. as it moved along side us, it would move forward then suddenly dart backward, both lights maintaining the same distance from each other diagonally. it kept doing this over and over. it would dart forward then dart backward about half the distance it had moved forward. it seemed to be very big, although how big, i couldn't say. it also seemed to be very low. it was right on top of the horizon from our perspective.  it moved past us a little so we got back in the car and drove with it. it stayed along side us for probably about a minute while we drove then suddenly darted across the road in front of us and sped away so fast that within about a second it was no longer visible.
content.summary: Two lights appearing to be linked diagonally moving in tandum

content.detailedDescription: I was doing a google maps search...And found this incredible photo in the area..............I did not personally witness the event..........And the date stamp on it says june/july 2009.  this is incredible. my friend says that if you look closely enough- you can even see a triangle above the object..........It appears to have some type of cloud or something that looks like it exploded.........
content.summary: Found a photo from google maps satellite that is incredible and i did not see it personally........

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my sister's house for christmas day. it was about 8:30 pm and my sister was preparing the christmas evening meal. i popped outside for a cigarette and about 1 minute later my mum joined me. maybe 1 or 2 minutes later mum was looking up at the sky and noticed an orange glowing orb. she pointed it out to me and asked me what it was. i looked and seeing a pulsating orange orb assumed it must have been a chinese lantern. this is how i responded. 'that's just a chinese lantern" i responded.

as i continued watching the light something caught the corner of my eye. i looked at whatever had captured my attention and quite clearly saw a large black disk moving on exactly the same trajectory as the orb except in front of the orb. i exclaimed to mum that the orb was not what she needed to be looking at but the large black disk preceding it. she looked but could not see what i could.

the disk and orb were moving at a steady speed and in the same direction. there was no noise emitted from either craft. the black disk was difficult to make out against the darkness of the night but was unmistakable (in case you are wondering mum had cataracts at the time so could not make out poorly defined objects e.G. black on black. she has since had the cataracts removed). mum saw the orb without problem, obviously. they both followed a straight line trajectory.

as mum didn't see the disk she just seemed amazed that she had seen an orange orb. personally if i had not seen the disk i would have put it down to a chinese lantern. when i realised that a big black disk was flying across the sky i was blown away. i have always been sceptical about ufo sightings but this nailed it home as convincing evidence in my mind. as to whether it was et or a home grown version of fantastic technology i don't know. i just know that i saw what i saw and feel obligated to report it.

i don't like talking about this other than with close, trusted family or friends. there is a large amount if ridicule that accompanies this subject and i do not enjoy being ridiculed.

unfortunately i did not have a camera capable of filming this event. the experience probably lasted about 45 seconds to 1 minute.
content.summary: Two objects. one red pulsating small orb, one large black disk.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 7:45 me and my friend were out side talking when we noticed a yellowiah orange light in the sky to the south of us it apperd to be above the monument and was flying it flew in kind of a circle it was in the sky for a couple of mins and then disappeared a couple of mins latter another one showed up above the monument and went from left east to west above the monument and disappeared. a couple mins latter a couple people showed up and we saw two more at the same time flying up from around the monument and a they went up into the sky and disappeared. then we saw one more seem to come up from around the base of the monument and went further into the sky then disappeared like the others.  all of them looked about the same and none of them went straight they kind of went in there direction but not in a straight line and there was plains in the sky at that time. it was amazing blew me away.
content.summary: Several of us saw ufos they wear orangeish red and wear above the monument. me and my friend saw 5 in all in about a 15 min period flying above the monument

content.detailedDescription: Yo estaba mirando hacia un conjunto del frente intentando tomar fotos a los adornos de navidad me llamo la atencion una luz que estaba en una planta estaba retitada de las luces esa parte estaba oscura y cada vez se encendia con mas fuerza y prendian y apagaban muy seguido en un momento vi al lado de la luz otra de color verde no alcance a tomar video  ya que tenia poca bateria en la camara pero alcance a tomar  unas fotos que son las evidencias de este evento.Las fotos son reales y no hubo montaje fuerontomadas hacia las 11:11 pm del 2 de enero del 2012
content.summary: Las luces que vi estaban al lado de una mata como palmas o de hojas que caen al suelo
